name: Friends.OS
description:
FRIENDS.OS
(Best played in fullscreen)

Developed for Ludum Dare 40

Theme: The more you have, the worse it is.

Friends.OS is a short point scoring management game in which you have a specific amount of time to perform internet/social media based actions. You gain friend points by completing actions and lose the game if you are unsuccessful in your endeavours. As you progress in the game, your ever growing friends list causes you strain as you battle to keep on top of all of the commitments required of you by a new operating system!

CONTROLS:

Game is played primarily with the mouse but does contain moments in which you will need to type.

  • Click the Kappa to maintain your Kappas Per Minute
  • Click the chat boxes and type the pre-defined answers
  • Move the wrist of your character so that the camera covers your face and take a selfie by clicking the camera screen
  • Grab the Blindr profiles and fling the people to the right and the dick picks to the left.
